nodes.text: The Ahch-To Conservation Society was a society that supported the conservation of the planet Ahch-To. At least one poster made by the group requested that visitors of the planet not eat the native Porgs. The poster was written in High Galactic alphabet and was eventually collected in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah.
The Ahch-To Conservation Society was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
